p: Furthermore, the effect of the volatile fraction of every EO was studied with the inverted Petri dish method (Maruzzella & Sicurella, 1960; Ross, O'Gara, Hill, Sleightholme, & Maslin, 2001), placing the disk impregnated with 15 μl of each EO in the lid of MHA with 5% defibrinated sheep blood and incubating under the conditions named before.
